list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor parameter handling in project-related functions.
Unified parameter structure by using destructuring for improved clarity. Updated `fetchProjectBySlug` to accept a string instead of an array. Adjusted `generateMetadata` and `Project` functions to reflect these changes, simplifying data handling and boosting readability.

task.summary: refactor pages to add content from CMS, refactor fetching to use one fetching function for both page content and project/skills
refactor pages to add content from CMS, refactor fetching to use one fetching function for both page content and project/skills, completed site, working on bugfix and styles
refactor pages to add content from CMS, refactor about page to map over content, fix styles, bug fixes
Added comment to add view more projects from the project page

Refactor skills page layout and update styles
Modified `.skills_container` to use a responsive grid layout instead of flex, improving alignment and scalability. Adjusted media queries for better mobile responsiveness and polished styles across related components.

Refactor skills page layout and update styles
Replaced flex with a responsive grid for improved alignment and scalability on the skills page. Modified media queries for better mobile responsiveness and polished list styles for consistency. Adjusted fetching function to enhance caching behavior.

Add @vercel/speed-insights package and integrate in layout
Integrated the SpeedInsights React component in the app's layout for performance insights. Updated `package.json` and `package-lock.json` to include the new dependency. Adjusted formatting for consistency in the `RootLayout` component.

Refactor fetch function and clean up project code
Updated fetch revalidation caching from 3600 to 60 seconds to improve data freshness. Removed unnecessary declarations and console logs, simplifying the codebase. Addressed metadata generation and parameter handling for better readability and performance in project and skills pages.

Refactor fetch function and clean up project code
Updated fetch revalidation caching from 3600 to 60 seconds to improve data freshness. Removed unnecessary declarations and console logs, simplifying the codebase. Addressed metadata generation and parameter handling for better readability and performance in project and skills pages.

Refactor parameter destructuring in project pages.
Updated parameter handling in `generateMetadata` and `ProjectPage` functions to use object destructuring, improving code readability. Minor changes were also made to `.idea/workspace.xml` for task and problem view state updates.

Refactor parameter handling in project-related functions.
Updated `generateMetadata` and `Project` functions to utilize a unified `Props` interface with object destructuring, improving code clarity. Adjusted `fetchProjectBySlug` to accept `slug` as an array to align with updated parameter structure. Minor edits applied to `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect changes.

Refactor parameter handling in project-related functions.
Unified parameter structure by using destructuring for improved clarity. Updated `fetchProjectBySlug` to accept a string instead of an array. Adjusted `generateMetadata` and `Project` functions to reflect these changes, simplifying data handling and boosting readability.

MESSAGE.value: refactor pages to add content from CMS, refactor fetching to use one fetching function for both page content and project/skills
refactor pages to add content from CMS, refactor fetching to use one fetching function for both page content and project/skills, completed site, working on bugfix and styles
refactor pages to add content from CMS, refactor about page to map over content, fix styles, bug fixes
Added comment to add view more projects from the project page

Refactor skills page layout and update styles
Modified `.skills_container` to use a responsive grid layout instead of flex, improving alignment and scalability. Adjusted media queries for better mobile responsiveness and polished styles across related components.

Refactor skills page layout and update styles
Replaced flex with a responsive grid for improved alignment and scalability on the skills page. Modified media queries for better mobile responsiveness and polished list styles for consistency. Adjusted fetching function to enhance caching behavior.

Add @vercel/speed-insights package and integrate in layout
Integrated the SpeedInsights React component in the app's layout for performance insights. Updated `package.json` and `package-lock.json` to include the new dependency. Adjusted formatting for consistency in the `RootLayout` component.

Refactor fetch function and clean up project code
Updated fetch revalidation caching from 3600 to 60 seconds to improve data freshness. Removed unnecessary declarations and console logs, simplifying the codebase. Addressed metadata generation and parameter handling for better readability and performance in project and skills pages.

Refactor parameter destructuring in project pages.
Updated parameter handling in `generateMetadata` and `ProjectPage` functions to use object destructuring, improving code readability. Minor changes were also made to `.idea/workspace.xml` for task and problem view state updates.

Refactor parameter handling in project-related functions.
Updated `generateMetadata` and `Project` functions to utilize a unified `Props` interface with object destructuring, improving code clarity. Adjusted `fetchProjectBySlug` to accept `slug` as an array to align with updated parameter structure. Minor edits applied to `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect changes.

Refactor parameter handling in project-related functions.
Unified parameter structure by using destructuring for improved clarity. Updated `fetchProjectBySlug` to accept a string instead of an array. Adjusted `generateMetadata` and `Project` functions to reflect these changes, simplifying data handling and boosting readability.
